method.name: init
method.summary: This is the init method of the puzzle
method.description: This is the init method of the puzzle

param.name: url
param.description: Url of image to be used for the puzzle.

param.name: _usePhpProxy
param.description: If set to true the image will be load thru a proxy, if set to false it uses getimagedata instead of the proxy.

method.name: loadImage
method.summary: This method loads the image and calls the createPuzzle method
method.description: This method loads the image and calls the createPuzzle method

param.name: url
param.description: Url of image to be used for the puzzle.

method.name: checkTime
method.summary: This method shows the timer and when it gets to zero it finishes the game
method.description: This method shows the timer and when it gets to zero it finishes the game

param.name: img
param.description: Image object to be used in the puzzle

method.name: centerPuzzle
method.summary: This method centers the puzzle in screen using css
method.description: This method centers the puzzle in screen using css

method.name: onMouseDown
method.summary: This method gets called when the user presses the mouse button on any piece
method.description: This method gets called when the user presses the mouse button on any piece

param.name: Event
param.description: object passed by the mouse event

method.name: onMouseUp
method.summary: This method gets called when the user releases the mouse button on any piece
method.description: This method gets called when the user releases the mouse button on any piece

param.name: Event
param.description: object passed by the mouse event
